org.cpsolver.ifs.assignment.context

Class AbstractClassWithContext<V extends Variable<V,T>,T extends Value<V,T>,C extends AssignmentContext>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cpsolver.ifs.assignment.context.AbstractClassWithContext<V,T,C>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - Variable
    T - Value
    C - Assignment Context
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CanHoldContext, HasAssignmentContext<V,T,C>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Config, Course, Instructor, RequestGroup, Reservation, Section

    public abstract class AbstractClassWithContext<V extends Variable<V,T>,T extends Value<V,T>,C extends AssignmentContext>
extends Object
implements HasAssignmentContext<V,T,C>, CanHoldContext
    An abstract implementation of an assignment context holding class. This works much like ConstraintWithContext or VariableWithContext, however, it is not tight to a particular class type. Instead getModel() needs to be implemented.
    Version:
    IFS 1.3 (Iterative Forward Search)
    Copyright (C) 2014 Tomáš Müller
    muller@unitime.org

    Author:
    Tomáš Müller

    • Method Detail

      • getContext

        public C getContext(Assignment<V,T> assignment)
        Returns an assignment context associated with this object. If there is no assignment context associated with this object yet, one is created using the HasAssignmentContext.createAssignmentContext(Assignment) method.
        Specified by:
        getContext in interface HasAssignmentContext<V extends Variable<V,T>,T extends Value<V,T>,C extends AssignmentContext>
        Parameters:
        assignment - given assignment
        Returns:
        assignment context associated with this object and the given assignment
